meanings.definition: To type or write before the final version.
meanings.sent1: She always pretypes her essays before submitting them.
meanings.sent2: I pretypes my emails to avoid mistakes.
meanings.sent3: He pretypes his jokes to make sure they are funny.
meanings.sent4: The author pretypes his novels to perfect the plot.
meanings.sent5: Pretyping is a helpful habit for proofreading.

meanings.definition: A preliminary or initial type or version.
meanings.sent1: The pretypes of the report were full of errors.
meanings.sent2: I need to review the pretypes before finalizing the document.
meanings.sent3: The pretypes of the cake were delicious but not perfect.
meanings.sent4: The pretypes of the plan showed potential for success.
meanings.sent5: Having multiple pretypes can help in decision-making.
